title: Curating with the Community
description:
The second meeting to pull together an exhibition for LGBTQ+ History Month! We want people who are interested in LGBT+ history, or interested in curating, or people who simply have life experiences of being LGBT+ Cambridge that they want to share.

If you are interested in this, have anything to share (even if you don’t want to be involved in curating it!) or want to find out more, email me at molly@encompassnetwork.org.uk or Sarah Dore at sarah.dore@museumofcambridge.org.uk
